Package wtf.choco.veinminer.tool.template

Class TemplateValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtf.choco.veinminer.tool.template.TemplateValidator
  • public final class TemplateValidator
extends Object
    A utility class that acts as a medium for checking the validity of templates against an ItemStack passed to the isValid(ItemStack, ToolCategory) method.
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,

        Check whether or not the provided item and category are valid according to this validator's template criteria and precedence.
        Parameters:

        category - the category to check
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise
